definition: unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed

sentences.english: Wow he send weapons to the enemy who beheads Christians.
sentences.chinese: 哇他竟然給斬殺基督徒的敵人運送武器。

sentences.english: To his surprise, the new neighbor is his primary school.
sentences.chinese: 令他驚訝的是，這個新鄰居竟然是他的小學同學。

sentences.english: He explained that he was robbing the bank because Santa had to pay his elves.
sentences.chinese: 他竟然說搶銀行是爲了要給小精靈們付工錢。

sentences.english: Gambling shavings inadvertently found that the beneficiary on SunQiMing policy turned out to be yourself.
sentences.chinese: 奕茹無意中發現，孫啓鳴保單上的受益人竟然是自己。

sentences.english: I did not know they wanted pens.
sentences.chinese: 但我事先不知道他們竟然會缺筆。

sentences.english: I still can't believe you didn't tell us about it, " said Ron grumpily ."
sentences.chinese: 你竟然不告訴我們有關計時器的事，我仍舊不能相信。

sentences.english: I couldn’t believe there were so many ways to earn miles.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢相信自己的眼睛，竟然有那麼多賺里程的方式。
他真笨，竟然回答了這個問題。

sentences.english: This fellow is traveling in a first-class compartment on a second-class ticket.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙竟然拿着二等車廂的票坐一等車廂。

sentences.english: Little had he thought that the old woman was just Hera herself .
sentences.chinese: 他並未想到此老婆婆竟然是赫拉本人。

sentences.english: Suprised at the fact that so many kinds of books are published in our country.
sentences.chinese: 驚奇的是發現我們國家竟然出版了這麼多種的書籍。

sentences.english: What a coincidence! We were born in the same hospital.
sentences.chinese: 太巧了，我們竟然在同一家醫院出生。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly I caught sight of my aunt in the first ward in the in-patient department.
sentences.chinese: 我竟然在住院部的第一個房間就看見了舅媽。

sentences.english: One such stand popped up by our water garden.
sentences.chinese: 有一羣這樣的馬利筋竟然侵入了我們的水邊花園。

sentences.english: Office air-conditioning in this hot day, even Naoqi a strike.
sentences.chinese: 辦公室裏的空調在這大熱天竟然鬧起了罷工。

sentences.english: It is wonderful that you should have achieved so much these years.
sentences.chinese: 這幾年你竟然取得如此大的成就，你真了不起。

definition: unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
original/former/originally/formerly/at first/so, actually, as it turns out
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
unexpected/hard to imagine/it had not occurred to me/who could have thought that
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
